{| class="wikitable sortable" ! Ball !! Description !! Catch bonus (%) !! Catch time (s) !! Price |- | [[Pokéball|Poké Ball]] || [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|24px]] A standard Pokéball || 0 || 1.25 || 100 {{pdollar}} |- | [[Greatball|Great Ball]] || [[File:Greatball.png|24px]] +5% chance to catch || 5 || 1 || 500 {{pdollar}} |- | [[Ultraball|Ultra Ball]] || [[File:Ultraball.png|24px]] +10% chance to catch || 10 || 0.75 || 2,000 {{pdollar}} |- | [[Masterball|Master Ball]] || [[File:Masterball.png|24px]] +100% chance to catch || 100 || 0.5 || Variable |- | [[Fastball|Fast Ball]] || [[File:Fastball.png|24px]] Reduced catch time || 0 || 0.5 || rowspan = 4 |
Variable [[Berries]]

20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]] in [[Shops|Goldenrod City]] [[Berry Master]] |- | [[Quickball|Quick Ball]] || [[File:Quickball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate on routes with less Pokémon defeated || 15% (0 route kills) to
0% (4012 route kills) || 1 |- | [[Timerball|Timer Ball]] || [[File:Timerball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate on routes with more Pokémon defeated || 0% (0 route kills) to
15% (9920 route kills) || 1 |- | [[Duskball|Dusk Ball]] || [[File:Duskball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate at night time or in dungeons || 15% between 6pm to 6am or in dungeons,
0% otherwise || 1 |- | [[Luxuryball|Luxury Ball]] || [[File:Luxuryball.png|24px]] A Luxury Pokéball || 0 || 1.25 || 20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]
5 - 10 Random [[File:Pomeg.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 3 Berries|Gen 3 Berries]] in [[Shops|Goldenrod City]] [[Berry Master]] |- | [[Diveball|Dive Ball]] || [[File:Diveball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate in water environments || 15% in water environments,
0% otherwise || 1.25 || rowspan=4| N/A (only as [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] loot) |- | [[Lureball|Lure Ball]] || [[File:Lureball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate on fished Pokémon || 15% on fished Pokémon,
0% otherwise || 1.25 |- | [[Nestball|Nest Ball]] || [[File:Nestball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate on earlier routes || 15% on early routes to
1% in late routes || 1.25 |- | [[Repeatball|Repeat Ball]] || [[File:Repeatball.png|24px]] Increased catch rate the more a Pokémon is captured. Also, gives 5x more [[Pokérus|EVs]] per capture || 15% at 274 captures to
0% at 0 captures || 1.25 |- | [[Beastball|Beast Ball]] || [[File:Beastball.png|25px]] Used to catch Ultra Beasts. Does not work with normal Pokémon || 10% to Ultra Beasts || 1s || 500 {{questpoints}} |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
